content.body: I’ve made a diagram that tries to map the problem space of the five “dataflow” TC39 proposals and their overlaps in functionality. Hopefully this would be the start of a productive discussion about how to holistically consider these features. Pinging Richard Gibson and yulia | back Jan. 3 since this was an explicit concern from them in prior plenary meetings.
